Package controller

Class ControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    public class ControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Implementation of Controller. Holds model and view attributes to delegate to. and a readable object(mainly for testing and functionality that may be added later) Main function is to parse user input, and delegate to the attributes functions as needed

    • Method Detail

      • handleUserInput

        public void handleUserInput​(java.lang.String input)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Handle user input and call functions from the model and view as needed. the commands are inputted and then sent to this function currently supported commands are: - new-project (creates a new project) - save-project (saves project as a text file) - save-image (saves project as a PPM, PNG, or JPEG depending on input) - add-layer (add a blank white layer to the project) - add-image-to-layer (adds a PPM, PNG, or JPEG to the layer specified) - set-filter (changes the filter on the layer specified to the specified filter) - load-project (loads a project from a txt file) - quit (ends the program)
        Specified by:
        handleUserInput in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        input - the user-input, or the input from the gui converted to user-input form

      • loadProject

        public void loadProject​(java.lang.String filename)
        load a project from a file. (currently supports text files)
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path to load the project from.
